data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Cerezo needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 7, Goal! Bruno Pereira Mendes gives Cerezo a 0-1 lead in Kawasaki.
Yusuke Maruhashi with an assist there.
Kawasaki's Yasuto Wakizaka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Cerezo at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Takuto Okabe awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Cerezo drives forward and Tatsuhiro Sakamoto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Takuto Okabe signals a throw-in for Cerezo, close to Kawasaki's area.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Free kick Kawasaki.
Yasuto Wakizaka is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Cerezo.
Takuto Okabe signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 27, Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Cerezo.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
Kawasaki pushes forward through Ryota Ohshima, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 34, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Reo Hatate for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Takuto Okabe awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 42, Penalty! Takuto Okabe points to the spot, great chance for Kawasaki...
Akihiro Ienaga converts the penalty to give Kawasaki a 2-1 lead.
In Kawasaki Kawasaki attack through Yu Kobayashi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
The second half has started at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Cerezo at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
In the minute 48, Kawasaki's Yasuto Wakizaka breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
In the minute 50, Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Goal! Yu Kobayashi extends Kawasaki's lead to 3-1.
Kyohei Noborizato instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Kawasaki.
The away team have replaced Hiroshi Kiyotake with Jun Nishikawa. This is the first substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
Cerezo make their second substitution with Yoichiro Kakitani replacing Toshiyuki Takagi.
In the minute 58, Koji Suzuki is on a sub for Bruno Pereira Mendes for Cerezo.
Ayumu Seko puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-2.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Kaoru Mitoma is replacing Yasuto Wakizaka for the home team.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 62, Takuto Okabe signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Cerezo are pushing forward but Hiroaki Okuno's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Free kick Cerezo.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 70, Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Cerezo's Koji Suzuki is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Kawasaki.
Great finish from Kaoru Mitoma to give Kawasaki a 4-2 lead.
Hidemasa Morita is replacing Reo Hatate for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Yu Kobayashi with Leandro Damiao.
Goal! Kawasaki extend their lead to 5-2 through Leandro Damiao.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 78, Hidemasa Morita for Kawasaki has been booked by Takuto Okabe and receives a first yellow card.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
In the minute 80, Miguel Angel Lotina is making the team's fourth substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Eiichi Katayama replacing Tatsuhiro Sakamoto.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Eiichi Katayama (Cerezo) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 85, Takuto Okabe awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Cerezo make their fifth substitution with Honoya Shoji replacing Hiroaki Okuno.
Throw-in high up the field for Cerezo in Kawasaki.
In the minute 88, Hidemasa Morita of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Cerezo's Koji Suzuki gets in a shot on goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Takuto Okabe awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Takuto Okabe awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
It's 5-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a fourth substitution, with Shintaro Kurumaya replacing Kyohei Noborizato.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a fifth substitution, with Taisei Miyashiro replacing Akihiro Ienaga.
